ygData.subject: RE: divine aura and gating?
ygData.msgSnippet: cant cast ANY spells with divine aura or barrier on....you have 18 seconds lee-way to get the hell out of dodge though :)  It saves me ALOT by either: 1)
ygData.messageBody:
cant cast ANY spells with divine aura or barrier on....you have 18 seconds
lee-way to get the hell out of dodge though :) It saves me ALOT by either:

1) Getting me to a zone
2) giving tanks time to taunt the creeps of me

-----Original Message-----
From: Rose [mailto:rliu@...]
Sent: Wednesday, August 25, 1999 4:08 PM
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ-Clerics] divine aura and gating?


From: "Rose" <rliu@...>

Can this be done? Can u cast divine aura and then gate? I have yet to try
because I'm always too busy running when I feel the need to cast divine
aura...and end up dying anyway >:(

-Imogen
